data.title: Currency NPR Nepal [Nepalese rupee]
data.text:
Other currency selection:

Currency

Currency details NPR Nepal [Nepalese rupee]

Label of currency NPR is Nepalese rupee.

Currency code NPR is associated to Nepal, flag is used on this site for it.

Amounts in this currency have up to 2 decimals.

It is mainly associated to country or zone Nepal.

Currency code NPR is a 3 letter normalized code according to standard ISO-4217, the 2 first letters are the code of the issuing country, third letter is the initial of the currency.

We recorded price on this currency since 1960-01-01

List of countries that are using or were using currency NPR :
